Key: Of course not!

Oh... So it's like that, is it?

Mmm... *groan*... Ooh... Good morning, Shido...

Yes, what is it?
Why did you sleep here?
Why...?

Shido, I knew it. You subconsciously brought Arusu

I didn't! ...Right?

(Last night we looked at the stars together, and

Yes. I entered Shido's bed on my own. That was a
